TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CustomProviderDataAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Provides a string of custom data to the provider for a profile property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The CustomProviderDataAttribute class is used to supply a string of data with a profile property to a custom profile provider. The custom data string can be set to any string value and is set using the `customProviderData` attribute of the configuration element for adding profile properties. If the `customProviderData` attribute is set, then the value is placed in the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty.Attributes%2A> collection for the property and is indexed by the name "CustomProviderData."

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string customProviderData) cil managed

Docs.param: The string of custom data to supply to the provider.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class and specifies a string of custom data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Profile.CustomProviderDataAttribute> class is used to supply a string of data with a profile property to a custom profile provider. The custom data string can be set to any string value and is set using the `customProviderData` attribute of the configuration element for adding profile properties. If the `customProviderData` attribute is set, then the value is placed in the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty.Attributes%2A> collection for the property and is indexed by the name "CustomProviderData."
This constructor is used the .NET Framework and is not intended to be called from application code.

Docs.summary: Gets a string of custom data for the profile property provider.
Docs.value: A string of custom data for the profile property provider. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The CustomProviderData property value is set using the `customProviderData` attribute of the configuration element for adding profile properties. The CustomProviderData property can be set to any string value to be used by the profile provider for the property. If the `customProviderData` attribute is set, then the value is placed in the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty.Attributes%2A> collection for the property and is indexed by the name "CustomProviderData."

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsDefaultAttribute() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.Profile.CustomProviderDataAttribute.CustomProviderData%2A> property is set to the default value.
Docs.returns: if the <xref:System.Web.Profile.CustomProviderDataAttribute.CustomProviderData%2A> property is set to the default value; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default value for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.CustomProviderDataAttribute.CustomProviderData%2A> property is `null`, or an empty string for profile properties of type `String`.
